title: Chii-chan wa Chotto Tarinai
original_name: ちーちゃんはちょっと足りない
sinopse:
She wants that one, she wants this one too... Middle schooler Chii-chan is always feeling like she doesn't quite have enough of something or another. Her slightly dissatisfied, run-of-the-mill daily life begins to change after a certain incident.

(Source: MU)
